mapper.select: SELECT dgs.group_id AS groupId, dgs.name, dgs.status, dgs.type, dgs.combine, dg.name AS groupName FROM dgs LEFT JOIN d_group dg ON dg.id = dgs.group_id WHERE dgs.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( name, status, combine, type, group_id, effective_date, expire_date, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{status}, #{combine}, #{type}, #{groupId}, #{effectiveDate}, #{expireDate}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
